checkForExceptions

public static boolean checkForExceptions(SQLError sqle,
                                         java.lang.String response)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
Look for SQL errors from the server and script errors from the scripting engine.
Chuck a wobbly (alias: a thrown exception) back to the requesting method with a few details about the problem.

Parameters:
response - Server response String.
Returns:
false if no errors are found.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if any errors are detected.

getMD5

public static java.lang.String getMD5(java.lang.String input)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Generate and return a full md5 MessageDigest for the String input. This is gold.

Parameters:
input - String to derive md5 digest from.
Returns:
md5 digest of input. Output as a String.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

public static org.apache.commons.httpclient.NameValuePair[] prepareForWeb(com.ozdevworx.iface.DataHandler input)
Parameters:
input - LabeledArray
Returns:
A single NameValuePair[] of NameValuePair's representing the input param
